frontmatter.announcement: Announcing EIP-712 support! See our mobile and library release notes https://developer.uport.me/releases for details.

node.name: Version 1.1.5
node.description: - Upgrade `uport-transports` to use Infura URLs with API key

node.name: Version 1.1.2
node.description:
## `Connect`
- Includes support for requesting ethereum accounts on a private chain, by providing a unique `chainId` and `rpcUrl` in a disclosure request
- Bumps versions on several dependencies for bug fixes and additional features
## `UportSubprovider`
- Adds dialog to select injected providers when present.  Enables dapps to support both uPort and Metamask/Mist/Coinbase Wallet etc. as web3 providers with the same code

node.name: v1.1.4 Update did-jwt
node.description: - Upgrade to latest version of did-jwt

node.name: v1.1.3 Fix for CallBack
node.description:
- Callbackurl has been added as a parameter in createVerification method
- rpcUrl has been added as a parameter in createDisclosureRequest method to support private chains
- upgrade to latest version of did-jwt

node.name: v423- Production Release
node.description:
- Improved Onboarding experience
- Name is now required when creating a new identity
- Scan button needs to be tapped before QR code can be scanned
- Menu is now collapsed at the bottom of the home screen
- Profile and Accounts Information are now accessed via the person icon
- Contacts are now accessed via the people icon
- Verifications are now accessed via the check icon
- Settings are now be accessed via the gear icon

node.name: v414 - Production Release
node.description:
- Adhoc private chain support
- Custom Attestation Callback Url support
- Fix to display app branding in request card
